scenes.action_text: "E.T." Commentary by Richard Michaels TITLES: "E.T. - THE EXTRA-TERRESTIAL" [The letters are in soft-purple against a black background. Purple is traditionally the color of that which is sacred.] EXT: NIGHT SKY: NIGHT The black screen becomes a night sky. The camera angles lowers to show a forest against the night sky. EXT: LANDING SITE: NIGHT In an opening in the forest stands a spacecraft. The view of the craft is obscured by tree branches. The atmosphere is misty, with
